info.name: Tagesschau Dark
info.description:
A dark theme for Tagesschau.de

Should you encounter any problems or have any suggestions don't hesitate to use the feedback button.

Sollten dir Fehler auffallen oder hast du irgendwelche Verbesserungs-Vorschlaege, nutze bitte den Feedback-Button.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0
- initial release
v1.1
- fixed various blue background and text areas
- quotes are a lot brighter now
- various other readability fixes
- 'replaced' blue by white arrows
v1.2
- fixed tables
v1.3
- fixed arrows in main navigation
- more distinctive color for bold text
- fixed search form
- fixed pager and power-user tools (sizes)
